preference.name: License_allow_dba_to_change
preference.preference_description: Allows the Default Local License Server to be changed by a DBA when they log in. Value of 'true' means anyone in the DBA group/role will create a new Default Local License Server if their value of SPLM_LICENSE_SERVER is different than that found in the database. Value of 'false' means that a DBA cannot change the Default Local License Server. Note - the user 'infodba' will always be allowed to change the Default Local License Server.
